stepAnswer: Noelle is 20 years old and her dad is 54 years old.
stepTitle: The age of Noelle’s dad is six less than three times Noelle’s age. The sum of their ages is seventy-four. Find their ages.
choices: Noelle is 20 years old and her dad is 54 years old.
